modName: Resist Poison for Falmer Hardened Armor
summary: Small ESP that modifies Falmer Hardened Armor so it gives you 50% Resist Posion if you\\\'re wearing full set of this armor.
descriptionHtml:
Small ESP that modifies Falmer Hardened Armor so it gives you 50% Resist Posion if you\\\'re wearing full set of this armor. Maybe now you should think about getting one, huh? :) Grab the Snakeblood perk and don\\\'t worry about Chaurus DOT poison that takes billions of health points per second.

Package contains Polish and English Language.

Requires Dawnguard DLC.

And you know how to install...
author: niedroProg
